amendment.description: Amendment sought to revise language addressing stormwater management provisions; leave the industry under the stormwater discharge permit system; and include a moratorium extending EPA's deadline for compliance by commercial operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 30 in the Congressional Record of May 9) to modify the provisions of the bill relating to stormwater discharge management. The amendment would relax requirement standards requirements for municipal stormwater programs, similar to the provisions of the bill, but would leave in place current standards for industry stormwater discharge.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mineta amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 258 (Roll no. 316).
